value.title: How the Trump Tax Law Created a Loophole That Lets Top Executives Net Millions by Slashing Their Own Salaries
value.excerpt: The 2017 tax cuts made it more attractive for certain company owners to be paid in profits instead of wages. Some cut their own wages, expanding a loophole that was already costing the U.S. billions.

value.title: Trump Teases About Running For President In 2024: 'You're Gonna Be Very Happy'
value.excerpt: The former president claimed it would be illegal to confirm his plans for re-election, but added that "a lot of our friends" will be happy.

value.title: Trump family friend, associate Ken Kurson re-arrested on cyber-stalking charges
value.excerpt: Seven months after he was granted a pardon by then-President Trump, Ken Kurson, a friend of Trump's son-in-law, was arrested Wednesday on new charges.

value.title: CNN’s Jeffrey Toobin ripped over column arguing against prosecuting Trump
value.excerpt: CNN legal analyst Jeffrey Toobin is facing backlash on social media over a column urging Attorney General Merrick Garland not to seek criminal prosecution of former

value.title: Vivek Ramaswamy blasts Twitter's 'staggering' hypocrisy on Taliban and Trump
value.excerpt: Biotech CEO and ‘Woke Inc.’ author Vivek Ramaswamy criticized Twitter on Tuesday for allowing the Taliban to utilize their social media platform while censoring others, including former President Donald Trump.

value.title: Todd wondered if the messy Afghan withdrawal will 'weaken Trump's hold' of the GOP over time
value.excerpt: NBC anchor Chuck Todd spoke with certainty that the turmoil that has erupted during President Biden's military withdrawal in Afghanistan would have also occurred under President Trump.

value.title: Former president coming to ‘heart of Trump country’ on return to Alabama
value.excerpt: John Wahl said he started working to bring former President Donald Trump back to Alabama right after the state Republican Party picked him as chairman in February. Earlier efforts fell through, including a planned rally July 3 at the U.

value.title: Rashida Tlaib stands by call for Trump impeachment despite backlash
value.excerpt: Rep. Rashida Tlaib on Friday refused to back down from her controversial call to impeach President Trump, despite mounting criticism. Ms. Tlaib told a crowd hours after being sworn in Thursday night that Democrats would go after the president.

value.title: Donald Trump blasts former secretary of state Rex Tillerson; ‘Dumb as a rock’
value.excerpt: President Trump denounced his former Secretary of State Thursday following reports Rex Tillerson quietly met with the House Foreign Affairs Committee and testified about his time in the Trump administration.

value.title: Mary Trump Says GOP 'Voter Suppression Laws' May 'Convince' Donald Trump to Run in 2024
value.excerpt: "Republicans are going to use those accusations of fraud—those grievances that are really stirring up the base and spreading by the way—to enact these voter suppression laws," said the niece of former President Donald Trump.

value.title: Newsom paints Larry Elder as ‘right of Donald Trump’ as recall election heats up
value.excerpt: Gov. Gavin Newsom was joined by prominent San Francisco politicians at Manny’s in San Francisco’s Mission District on Friday.

value.title: Moscow says no plans to discuss Edward Snowden’s status during Trump-Putin summit
value.excerpt: Russia's foreign minister on Friday cast doubt on the possibility of extraditing Edward Snowden, the fugitive former National Security Agency contractor who received political asylum from Moscow after leaking classified documents to the media in 2013.

value.title: Lamborn dismissed pandemic as hoax meant to derail Trump’s reelection, ex-staffer says in sworn statement
value.excerpt: Allegations that U.S. Rep. Doug Lamborn, R-Colorado Springs, fired a staffer in retaliation after the staffer sought to protect himself and others during the pandemic are true, another former

value.title: Trump fundraises off ‘total loser’ Andrew Cuomo resigning
value.excerpt: Former President Donald Trump is fundraising off the resignation of “total loser” and soon-to-be-former New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo.

value.title: Trump 'Reinstatement Day' Latest Failure in Predictions He'll Resume Presidency, Oust Biden
value.excerpt: Despite the months-long failed predictions that Trump would be reinstated as president, some supporters of the theory continue to peddle it.

value.title: DeSantis, faced with covid surge, urges Floridians to use Regeneron antibody treatment given to Trump
value.excerpt: Ron DeSantis (R) is vowing to begin dispensing Regeneron monoclonal antibodies — the treatment given to President Donald Trump when he had the coronavirus — through mobile clinics amid a record-breaking stretch of new cases and hospitalizations that have ravaged the state.

value.title: Bad News for ‘Trump-Adjacent Weirdos’ Delights Seth Meyers
value.excerpt: Meyers enjoyed seeing Mike Lindell get word on camera that a defamation suit against him over his claims of election fraud would proceed.

value.title: Billy Long touts Trump ties during Senate seat campaign rally in Joplin
value.excerpt: Mo., touted his strong friendship with former President Donald Trump during a Thursday morning campaign rally stop at Cunningham Park.

value.title: Van Orden receives Trump endorsement for Wisconsin race
value.excerpt: MADISON, Wis. (AP) — Former President Donald Trump on Thursday gave his “Complete and Total Endorsement!” to the Republican seeking to flip a southwestern Wisconsin congressional district held by Democratic Rep. Ron Kind since 1997. Derrick Van Orden ...

value.title: What Rosen told U.S. senators: Trump applied ‘persistent’ pressure to get Justice to discredit election
value.excerpt: Trump’s last attorney general told lawmakers he had to “persuade the president not to pursue a different path.”

value.title: Cuomo, Avenatti, The Lincoln Project: The media's anti-Trump idols who've collapsed in disgrace
value.excerpt: Democratic New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo was not only hailed by the media as a hero of the coronavirus pandemic; he was also being floated as a presidential candidate.

value.title: Judge rules Dominion defamation case against Trump allies can proceed
value.excerpt: A federal judge cleared the way for a defamation case​ by Dominion Voting Systems to proceed against Sidney Powell, Rudy Giuliani and Mike Lindell.

value.title: Trump Tax Cuts Saved Bloomberg $68 Million in Just One Year
value.excerpt: IRS records obtained by ProPublica show how the Trump tax cuts are a boon for many billionaires — even billionaires who called Trump a “clown.”

value.title: Trump, GOP slam Dems’ $3.5T budget as ‘Communist plan to destroy’ US
value.excerpt: Former President Donald Trump led the Republican criticism after a 15-hour “vote-a-rama” overnight that saw senators pass the $3.5 trillion budget reconciliation package.

value.title: Donald Trump Calls $3.5T Budget Plan 'Assault on Our Nation' After Measure Clears Senate
value.excerpt: Former President Donald Trump said Americans are being "robbed" after the Democrats' $3.5 trillion budget plan "Good morning, America!

value.title: Trump was 'in pain and afraid' from COVID-19, says niece Mary Trump
value.excerpt: The former president’s niece made the claim in a new book. Former President Trump was allegedly “in pain and afraid” after he contracted the coronavirus back in early October. Mary claimed that he was struggling to breathe while playing up theatrical his return.

value.title: Secret IRS Files Reveal How Much the Ultrawealthy Gained by Shaping Trump’s “Big, Beautiful Tax Cut”
value.excerpt: Billionaire business owners deployed lobbyists to make sure Trump’s 2017 tax bill was tailored to their benefit. Confidential IRS records show the windfall that followed.

value.title: MSNBC opinion piece argues 'Why Ron DeSantis is more dangerous than Trump' ahead of 2024
value.excerpt: Conservative pundits have long predicted ahead of 2024 that members of the media would insist that Republican Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis would be a “worse” president than President Trump. Well, one MSNBC opinion piece is way ahead of schedule.

value.title: Time's Up co-founder Robbie Kaplan sued Donald Trump and Nazis. But she's also helped at least 3 targets of sex misconduct claims.
value.excerpt: Robbie Kaplan is well-known for her progressive legal work. But her work for clients accused of sexual misconduct cover-ups has reared its head.

value.title: China hawk Mike Gallagher bridges GOP’s establishment, Trump wings
value.excerpt: Mike Gallagher never intended to be in Washington for the long haul. Since being elected in 2016, the Wisconsin Republican has advocated for congressional reforms such as term limits and lobbying restrictions for officeholders.
